"Sint Maarten", "code": "SX" }, { "name": "Bonaire, Saint Eustatius and Saba", "code": "BQ" }, { "name": "South Sudan", "code": "SS" }, { "name": "Serbia and Montenegro", "code": "CS" }, { "name": "Saint Barthelemy", "code": "BL" } ]

    for(var c = 0; c<countries.length; c++) {
            if(c == 0){
        $('[id^='+whereto+']').append('<option value>' + countries[c].name + '</option>');

            }else{
        $('[id^='+whereto+']').append('<option value="' + countries[c].code + '">' + countries[c].name + '</option>');
            }
    }
}
 function addStates(whereto) {
    let states = [
      { "name": "", "code": "none" },
      { "name": "Alabama", "code": "AL" }, { "name": "Alaska", "code": "AK" }, { "name": "Arizona", "code": "AZ" },
      { "name": "Arkansas", "code": "AR" }, { "name": "California", "code": "CA" }, { "name": "Colorado", "code": "CO" },
      { "name": "Connecticut", "code": "CT" }, { "name": "Delaware", "code": "DE" }, { "name": "Florida", "code": "FL" },
      { "name": "Georgia", "code": "GA" }, { "name": "Hawaii", "code": "HI" }, { "name": "Idaho", "code": "ID" },
      { "name": "Illinois", "code": "IL" }, { "name": "Indiana", "code": "IN" }, { "name": "Iowa", "code": "IA" },
      { "name": "Kansas", "code": "KS" }, { "name": "Kentucky", "code": "KY" }, { "name": "Louisiana", "code": "LA" },
      { "name": "Maine", "code": "ME" }, { "name": "Maryland", "code": "MD" }, { "name": "Massachusetts", "code": "MA" },
      { "name": "Michigan", "code": "MI" }, { "name": "Minnesota", "code": "MN" }, { "name": "Mississippi", "code": "MS" },
      { "name": "Missouri", "code": "MO" }, { "name": "Montana", "code": "MT" }, { "name": "Nebraska", "code": "NE" },
      { "name": "Nevada", "code": "NV" }, { "name": "New Hampshire", "code": "NH" }, { "name": "New Jersey", "code": "NJ" },
      { "name": "New Mexico", "code": "NM" }, { "name": "New York", "code": "NY" }, { "name": "North Carolina", "code": "NC" },
      { "name": "North Dakota", "code": "ND" }, { "name": "Ohio", "code": "OH" }, { "name": "Oklahoma", "code": "OK" },
      { "name": "Oregon", "code": "OR" }, { "name": "Pennsylvania", "code": "PA" }, { "name": "Rhode Island", "code": "RI" },
      { "name": "South Carolina", "code": "SC" }, { "name": "South Dakota", "code": "SD" }, { "name": "Tennessee", "code": "TN" },
      { "name": "Texas", "code": "TX" }, { "name": "Utah", "code": "UT" }, { "name": "Vermont", "code": "VT" },
      { "name": "Virginia", "code": "VA" }, { "name": "Washington", "code": "WA" }, { "name": "West Virginia", "code": "WV" },
      { "name": "Wisconsin", "code": "WI" }, { "name": "Wyoming", "code": "WY" }
    ];
    
    // Populate the state dropdown
    for (var c = 0; c < states.length; c++) {
      if (c == 0) {
        $('[id=' + whereto + ']').append('<option value="-" selected>' + states[c].name + '</option>');
      } else {
        $('[id=' + whereto + ']').append('<option value="' + states[c].code + '">' + states[c].name + '</option>');
      }
    }
  }

  // Add states to any select with ID 'state' by default
  addStates('state');
  addCountries('country');

  // Function to handle change in country selection
  function handleCountryChange(event) {
    const countryValue = event.target.value;
    const stateElements = document.querySelectorAll('#state, [id$="-State"]'); // Selects all states including generic and form specific
    const stateBlockElements = document.querySelectorAll('#state-block, [id$="-State-Block"]'); // Selects all state blocks

    if (countryValue === "US") {
      stateBlockElements.forEach(element => element.style.display = "block");
      stateElements.forEach(element => element.value = null);
    } else {
      stateBlockElements.forEach(element => element.style.display = "none");
      stateElements.forEach(element => {
        element.required = false;
        element.selectedIndex = 0;
        element.value = "-";
      });
    }
  }

  // Attach event listener to any country dropdowns with ID 'country' or ending with '-Country'
  document.querySelectorAll('#country, [id$="-Country"]').forEach(countryElement => {
    countryElement.addEventListener('change', handleCountryChange);
  });

  // Webflow specific code to add states to forms listed in the array
  let forms = [
    "Start-Free-Trial", "Main-Form", "Nav-Get-a-Demo", "Primary-CTA-Free-Trial", 
    "Primary-CTA-Get-a-Demo", "Contact-Page", "Featured-Resource", "Whitepaper-Resource", 
    "Resource-Page", "Specific-Event-Form", "Specific-Resource"
  ];

  Webflow.push(function () {
    forms.forEach(form => {
      addCountries(form + "-Country");
      addStates(form + "-State");
    });
  });

  // Attach event listeners to all country dropdowns related to the forms listed
  forms.forEach((form) => {
    const countrySelector = `#${form}-Country`;
    document.querySelectorAll(countrySelector).forEach(countryElement => {
      countryElement.addEventListener("change", handleCountryChange);
    });
  });
var form = document.getElementById("main_form_2");
var url = window.location.pathname;
if (form){
  var field = form.querySelector("#Message");
  if(url === "/contact") {
    field.classList.remove('hidden')
  }else{
    field.value = "-"
    console.log("field.value", field.value)
  }
}

$('#current_url').val(window.location.pathname);
  
</script>

<script>
  const now = new Date();
  const dateTimeString = now.toISOString();
  $('form').each(function() {
   for (let param of params) {
    let paramData = urlParams.get(param) || localStorage.getItem(param) || "-";
 
     $(this).append($('<input>').attr({
      type: 'hidden',
      name: param,
      value: paramData
    }));
    
}
    $(this).append($('<input>').attr({
      type: 'hidden',
      name: 'currentDateTime',
      value: dateTimeString
    }));
    
    const formId = $(this).find('#form-identifier').attr('data-id');
    if(formId){
      $(this).append($('<input>').attr({
        type: 'hidden',
        name: 'form_id',
        value: formId
      }));
    }
  });
  
$('.form-label.focus-in').removeClass('focus-in');

$('.text-input, .select-field').on('focusin', function() {
  $(this).siblings('.form-label').addClass('focus-in');
});

$('.text-input, .select-field').on('focusout change', function() {
  $(this).siblings('.form-label').toggleClass('focus-in', $(this).val() !== '');
});
</script>
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/gsap/3.11.4/gsap.min.js"></script>

<script>
let menuLink = $(".nav-dropdown-link");
let content = $(".nav-hover-2");
let menuBG = $(".nav-menu-bg-2");
let dropdownWrap = $(".nav-content-2");
let menuArrow = $(".nav-arrow-wrap");
content.hide()
menuBG.css("overflow","hidden");

gsap.defaults({
  duration: .3
});

function revealDropdown(currentLink, currentContent) {
  dropdownWrap.css("display", "flex");
  gsap.set(menuArrow, {
    width: currentLink.outerWidth(),
    x: currentLink.offset().left
  });
  gsap.set(menuBG, {
    width: currentContent.outerWidth(),
    height: currentContent.outerHeight()
  });
  gsap.set(content, {
    opacity: 0
  });
  gsap.set(currentContent, {
    opacity: 1,
    x: "0em"
  });
}

function switchDropdown(currentLink, previousContent, currentContent) { 
  gsap.to(menuArrow, {
    width: currentLink.outerWidth(),
    x: currentLink.offset().left
  });
  gsap.to(menuBG, {
    width: currentContent.outerWidth(),
    height: currentContent.outerHeight()
  });
  // invert moveDistance if needed
  let moveDistance = 10;
  if (currentContent.index() < previousContent.index()) {
    moveDistance = moveDistance * -1;
  }
  gsap.fromTo(
    previousContent,
    { opacity: 1, x: "0em" },
    {
      opacity: 0,
      x: moveDistance * -1 + "em",
      duration: .15,
        onComplete: () => {
            previousContent.hide()
        }
    }
  );
  gsap.fromTo(
    currentContent,
    { opacity: 0, x: moveDistance + "em" },
    {
      opacity: 1,
      x: "0em",
      duration: .15
    }
  );
}

let showDropdown = gsap.timeline({
  paused: true,
  onReverseComplete: () => {
    dropdownWrap.css("display", "none");
    menuLink.removeClass("active");
  }
});
showDropdown.from(dropdownWrap, { opacity: 0, rotateX: -10, duration: 0.2 }).to(menuArrow, { opacity: 1, duration: 0.2 }, "<");

menuLink.on("mouseenter", function () {
  menuBG.show()
  let previousLink = menuLink.filter(".active").removeClass("active");
  let currentLink = $(this).addClass("active");
  let previousContent = content.filter(".active").removeClass("active");
  let currentContent = content.eq($(this).index()).addClass("active");

    if(previousContent.length > 0 && currentContent[0] != previousContent[0]){
      setTimeout(function() {
        previousContent.hide();
      }, 150);
    }
	currentContent.show()

  showDropdown.play();
  if (previousLink.length === 0) {
    revealDropdown(currentLink, currentContent);
  } else if (previousLink.index() !== currentLink.index()) {
    switchDropdown(currentLink, previousContent, currentContent);
  }
});

$(".primary-nav-links").on("mouseleave", function () {
  showDropdown.reverse();
});

</script>
<script>
        // List of blocked email domains
        const blockedDomains = [
            "gmail.com",
  "hotmail.com",
  "yahoo.com",
  "outlook.com",
  "icloud.com",
  "protonmail.com",
  "qq.com",
  "163.com",
  "me.com",
  "comcast.net",
  "aol.com",
  "hotmail.co.uk",
  "yahoo.co.uk",
  "live.com",
  "mail.com",
  "email.com",
  "msn.com",
  "yahoo.fr",
  "naver.com",
  "gmx.com",
  "mail.ru",
  "verizon.net",
  "ymail.com",
  "hotmail.fr",
  "artlover.com",
  "btinternet.com",
  "att.net",
  "orange.fr",
  "yandex.com",
  "googlemail.com",
  "bk.ru",
  "web.de",
  "yandex.ru",
  "outlook.fr",
  "rambler.ru",
  "free.fr",
  "wp.pl",
  "foxmail.com",
  "hotmail.it",
  "wanadoo.fr",
  "t-online.de",
  "live.co.uk",
  "my.com",
  "yahoo.co.in",
  "live.fr",
  "live.nl",
  "rocketmail.com",
  "yahoo.ca",
  "tom.com",
  "libero.it",
  "yeah.net",
  "139.com",
  "hotmail.de",
  "temple.edu",
  "earthlink.net",
  "rediffmail.com",
  "live.com.au",
  "hotmail.ca",
  "yahoo.gr",
  "yahoo.it",
  "yahoo.com.au",
  "yahoo.com.br",
  "virginmedia.com",
  "fastmail.com",
  "sudomail.com",
  "talktalk.net",
  "yaho.com",
  "yahoo.es",
  "myself.com",
  "outlook.pt",
  "live.cl",
  "windstream.net",
  "ya.ru",
  "yahoo.com.sg",
  "hanmail.net",
  "gmx.at",
  "fake.com",
  "outlook.de",
  "gmx.fr",
  "yahoo.com.tw",
  "live.ie",
  "hotmail.nl",
  "hotmail.be",
  "outlook.co.id",
  "gmx.net",
  "yahoo.de",
  "fastmail.fm",
  "mydomain.com",
  "mailbox.org",
  "sprintmail.com",
  "outlook.it",
  "gmx.co.uk",
  "outlook.jp",
  "list.ru",
  "live.ca",
  "live.de",
  "gmail.ru",
  "mail.fr",
  "operamail.com",
  "africamail.com",
  "live.dk"
        ];

        // Function to check if an email belongs to a blocked domain
        function isBlockedDomain(email) {
            const domain = email.split('@')[1];
            return blockedDomains.includes(domain);
        }

        // Function to handle email input
        function handleEmailInput(event) {
            const email = event.target.value;
            const errorMessage = event.target.nextElementSibling;
            if (isBlockedDomain(email)) {
                errorMessage.style.display = 'block';
                event.target.setCustomValidity('Please use a business email.');
            } else {
                errorMessage.style.display = 'none';
                event.target.setCustomValidity('');
            }
        }

        // Function to handle form submission
        function handleFormSubmission(event) {
            const emailInputs = event.target.querySelectorAll('input[type="email"]');
            let formIsValid = true;
            emailInputs.forEach(input => {
                const email = input.value;
                if (isBlockedDomain(email)) {
                    const errorMessage = input.nextElementSibling;
                    errorMessage.style.display = 'block';
                    formIsValid = false;
                }
            });
            if (!formIsValid) {
                event.preventDefault();
            }
        }

        // Attach event listeners to all email inputs and forms on the page
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            const emailInputs = document.querySelectorAll('input[type="email"]');
            emailInputs.forEach(input => {
                // Create an error message element
                const errorMessage = document.createElement('div');
                errorMessage.className = 'error-message';
                errorMessage.textContent = 'Please use a business email';
                input.insertAdjacentElement('afterend', errorMessage);

                // Add event listener
                input.addEventListener('input', handleEmailInput);
            });

            // Attach submit event listener to all forms
            const forms = document.querySelectorAll('form');
            forms.forEach(form => {
                form.addEventListener('submit', handleFormSubmission);
            });
        });
</script>
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/gsap/3.12.4/gsap.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/gsap/3.12.4/ScrollTrigger.min.js"></script>
<script>window.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", (event) => {
  // attribute value checker
  function attr(defaultVal, attrVal) {
    const defaultValType = typeof defaultVal;
    if (typeof attrVal !== "string" || attrVal.trim() === "") return defaultVal;
    if (attrVal === "true" && defaultValType === "boolean") return true;
    if (attrVal === "false" && defaultValType === "boolean") return false;
    if (isNaN(attrVal) && defaultValType === "string") return attrVal;
    if (!isNaN(attrVal) && defaultValType === "number") return +attrVal;
    return defaultVal;
  }
  const colorThemes = [];
  const htmlStyles = getComputedStyle(document.documentElement);
  const targetStylesheet = document.querySelector("#color-themes");
  const regex = /--([^:\s]+):\s*var\(--([^)]+)\);/g;

  if (targetStylesheet) {
    const rules = targetStylesheet.sheet.cssRules || targetStylesheet.sheet.rules;
    for (const rule of rules) {
      const styleObject = {};
      let match;
      while ((match = regex.exec(rule.cssText)) !== null) {
        const key = "--" + match[1];
        const value = htmlStyles.getPropertyValue("--" + match[2]);
        styleObject[key] = value;
      }
      colorThemes.push(styleObject);
    }

    const durationSetting = attr(0.4, targetStylesheet.getAttribute("speed")),
      easeSetting = attr("power1.out", targetStylesheet.getAttribute("ease")),
      offsetSetting = attr(50, targetStylesheet.getAttribute("percent-from-top")),
      breakpointSetting = attr(0, targetStylesheet.getAttribute("min-width"));
    gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger);

    const triggerElements = document.querySelectorAll("[animate-body-to]");
    triggerElements.forEach((element, index) => {
      const modeIndex = +element.getAttribute("animate-body-to");
      let endSetting = `clamp(bottom ${offsetSetting}%)`;
      if (index === triggerElements.length - 1) endSetting = `bottom ${offsetSetting}%`;
      gsap.matchMedia().add(`(min-width: ${breakpointSetting}px)`, () => {
        const colorScroll = gsap.timeline({
          scrollTrigger: {
            trigger: element,
            start: `clamp(top ${offsetSetting}%)`,
            end: endSetting,
            toggleActions: "play complete none reverse"
          }
        });
        colorScroll.to("body", { ...colorThemes[modeIndex - 1], duration: durationSetting, ease: easeSetting });
      });
    });
  }
});</script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/studio-freight/lenis@1.0.23/bundled/lenis.min.js"></script> 
<script>
// LENIS SMOOTH SCROLL
let lenis;
if (Webflow.env("editor") === undefined) {
  lenis = new Lenis({
    lerp: 0.5,
    wheelMultiplier: 0.75,
    gestureOrientation: "vertical",
    normalizeWheel: false,
    smoothTouch: false
  });
  function raf(time) {
    lenis.raf(time);
    requestAnimationFrame(raf);
  }
  requestAnimationFrame(raf);
}
$("[data-lenis-start]").on("click", function () {
  lenis.start();
});
$("[data-lenis-stop]").on("click", function () {
  lenis.stop();
});
$("[data-lenis-toggle]").on("click", function () {
  $(this).toggleClass("stop-scroll");
  if ($(this).hasClass("stop-scroll")) {
    lenis.stop();
  } else {
    lenis.start();
  }
});
  
</script>
<script>
function updateLink(containerId, newHref) {
    const container = document.getElementById(containerId);
    if (container) {
        const dropdownToggle = container.querySelector('.navbar12_dropdown-toggle');
        if (dropdownToggle) {
            // Create a new anchor element
            const newLink = document.createElement('a');
            newLink.href = newHref;
            
            // Copy attributes from the dropdown toggle to the new link
            for (let i = 0; i < dropdownToggle.attributes.length; i++) {
                const attr = dropdownToggle.attributes[i];
                newLink.setAttribute(attr.name, attr.value);
            }
            
            // Copy the inner content
            newLink.innerHTML = dropdownToggle.innerHTML;
            
            // Replace the dropdown toggle with the new link
            dropdownToggle.parentNode.replaceChild(newLink, dropdownToggle);
        }
    }
}

// Call the function for each link
updateLink('products-link', '/products');
updateLink('resource-link', '/resources');
updateLink('company-link', '/company');
updateLink('partner-link', '/partners');
</script><p id="twitter-share-text" fs-socialshare-element="content" style="display: none;">Check out this article by Darktrace: Identifying PrivateLoader Network Threats</p>

<style>
.text-rich-text.truncate {
	display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-line-clamp: 10;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical; 
  width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  white-space: normal;
}

.global-rich-text a {
  word-wrap: break-word;
}
</style>

<script>
   
  function shareToLinkedIn(btn, link) {
    btn.setAttribute('target', '_blank');
    btn.setAttribute(
        'href',
        `https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=${link}`
    );
    btn.setAttribute('rel', 'noreferrer noopener');
}

    function socialShare(platform, btn, link) {
         if (platform === 'facebook') {
             shareToFacebook(btn, link);
         } else if (platform === 'twitter') {
             shareToTwitter(btn, link);
         } else if (platform === 'linkedin') {
             shareToLinkedIn(btn, link);
         }
     
    }
    
    // social sharing
    const btns = {
        'linkedin': document.querySelector('[data-social="linkedin"]'),
        'twitter': document.querySelector('[data-social="twitter"]')
    }

    const link = window.location.href;

    for (let key in btns) {
        if (btns.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
            socialShare(key, btns[key], link);
        }
    }
    
   </script><script src="https://hubspotonwebflow.com/assets/js/form-124.js" type="text/javascript" integrity="sha384-bjyNIOqAKScdeQ3THsDZLGagNN56B4X2Auu9YZIGu+tA/PlggMk4jbWruG/P6zYj" crossorigin="anonymous"></script></body></html>
